spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Authentication_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Control the debug level. Enable and disable invasive and non-invasive debug

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: clock_Slave_TPIUTRACECLKIN
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Async clock for the TPIU traceport

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: clock_Slave_CPU0STCLK
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: CPU0 alternative clock source of SysTick

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: CPWRUP_Master_CDBG
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: CoreSight Power-up Request for debug power domain

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Staticcfg_Slave_Timer0Privmoden
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer0 Privileged Access mode configuration. Defines if the timer memory mapped registers are writeable only by privileged access

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Staticcfg_Slave_Timer1Privmoden
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer1 Privileged Access mode configuration. Defines if the timer memory mapped registers are writeable only by privileged access

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Status_Master_APBQActive
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: APB bus active signal for global clock gating control of all APB peripherals.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Status_Master_Timer0PCLKQActive
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer0 APB bus active signal for clock gating control of the APB peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Status_Master_Timer1PCLKQActive
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer1 APB bus active signal for clock gating control of the APB peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: AHBLite_excl_Master_TARGFLASH0EXR
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: External AHB-Lite target flash 0 exclusive interface

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: clock_Slave_TIMER0PCLKG
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer0 APB clock. Gated clock input for register interface (APB).

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: RESET_Slave_TIMER0PRESETn
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer0 reset. Deassert the reset synchronously to TIMER0PCLK.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: clock_Slave_TIMER1PCLKG
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer1 APB clock. Gated clock input for register interface (APB).

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: RESET_Slave_TIMER1PRESETn
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Timer1 reset. Deassert the reset synchronously to TIMER1PCLK.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: SWJ_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: JTAG and SW Debug access interface

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Status_Master_CPU0ETMINTNUM
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt number of the current execution context from CPU trace external interface

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Status_Master_CPU0ETMINTSTAT
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt status from CPU trace external interface

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: DynamicConfig_Slave_CPU0FIXMASTERTYPE
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Configure fix HMASTER value on AHB-AP interface

spirit:memoryMap.spirit:name: AHBLiteInitiator_Slave_INITEXP_MM
spirit:memoryMap.spirit:description: External AHB-Lite initiator 0 and 1 Memory Map

spirit:view.spirit:name: RTL
spirit:view.spirit:description: RTL for IoT subsystem of Cortex-M3 DesignStart Eval

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0STCALIB
spirit:port.spirit:description: Calibration signal for alternative clock source of SysTick.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGFLASH0MEMATTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Memory attributes port for AHB-Lite external target flash interface

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGFLASH0EXREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive request extention for target flash interface.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGFLASH0HMASTER
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface HMASTER extention for target flash interface.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGFLASH0EXRESP
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive response extention for target flash interface.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP0MEMATTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Memory attributes port for AHB-Lite external target interface 1

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP0EXREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive request extention for target expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP0HMASTER
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface HMASTER extention for target expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP0EXRESP
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive response extention for target expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP1MEMATTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Memory attributes port for AHB-Lite external target interface 1

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP1EXREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive request extention for target expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP1HMASTER
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface HMASTER extention for target expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TARGEXP1EXRESP
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive response extention for target expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP0HSEL
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface slave select signal for initiator expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP0MEMATTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Memory attributes port for AHB-Lite external initiator interface 0

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP0EXREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive request extention for initiator expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP0HMASTER
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface HMASTER extention for initiator expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP0EXRESP
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive response extention for initiator expansion port 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP1HSEL
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface slave select signal for initiator expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP1MEMATTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Memory attributes port for AHB-Lite external initiator interface 1

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP1EXREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive request extention for initiator expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP1HMASTER
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface HMASTER extention for initiator expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: INITEXP1EXRESP
spirit:port.spirit:description: AHB-Lite interface exclusive response extention for initiator expansion port 1.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0EDBGRQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: External debug request. Combined debug request from ETM trace unit and multiprocessor debug support to connect to CoreSight Embedded Cross Trigger.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0DBGRESTART
spirit:port.spirit:description: External restart request. The processor exits the halt state when the CPU0DBGRESTART signal is deasserted during 4-phase handshaking.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0DBGRESTARTED
spirit:port.spirit:description: Handshake for CPU0DBGRESTART. Devices driving CPU0DBGRESTART must observe this signal to generate the required 4-phase handshaking.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHADDR
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB address bus.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHTRANS
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB transfer type.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHSIZE
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB transfer size.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHBURST
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB burst type.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHPROT
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB transfer protection.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHWDATA
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB write data bus.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHWRITE
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB write signal indicating transfer direction.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHRDATA
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB read data bus.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHREADY
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB ready signal indicating transfer completion.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HTMDHRESP
spirit:port.spirit:description: HTM interface AHB transfer response.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0ETMINTNUM
spirit:port.spirit:description: Marks the interrupt number of the current execution context.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0ETMINTSTAT
spirit:port.spirit:description: Interrupt status. Marks interrupt status of current cycle.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0HALTED
spirit:port.spirit:description: In halting mode debug. HALTED remains asserted while the core is in debug.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0MPUDISABLE
spirit:port.spirit:description: If asserted the MPU is invisible and unusable. Tie HIGH to disable the MPU. Tie LOW to enable the MPU, if present.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0WICENACK
spirit:port.spirit:description: Active-HIGH acknowledge signal for WICENREQ. If you do not require PMU, then tie this signal HIGH to enable the WIC if the WIC is implemented.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0WICSENSE
spirit:port.spirit:description: Active HIGH set of signals. These indicate the input lines that cause the WIC to generate the WAKEUP signal. (optional, for testing).

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0WICENREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: Active-HIGH request for deep sleep to be WIC-based deep sleep. The PMU drives this.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0SYSRESETREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: Processor control - system reset request AIRC.SYSRESETREQ MMR controls this bit.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0LOCKUP
spirit:port.spirit:description: Indicates when the core gets a fault whilst its in the HF or NMI handler which causes it to reexecute the faulted instruction and cannot progress.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0BRCHSTAT
spirit:port.spirit:description: Conditional branch status at decode. 0x0 = No branch. 0x1 = conditional branch backwards. 0x2 = conditional branch. 0x3 = Execute time conditional branch. 0x4 = unconditional branch. 0x5 = Execute time unconditional branch. 0x6 = Reserved. 0x7 = Reserved. 0x8 = Conditional branch taken, cycle after 0x1 or 0x2

spirit:port.spirit:name: MTXREMAP
spirit:port.spirit:description: Remapping enable/disable for various regions of the memory map to AHB expansion port. Bit1 SRAM 1. Bit2 SRAM2. Bit3 SRAM3

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0INTISR
spirit:port.spirit:description: CPU0 External interrupt signals.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0INTNMI
spirit:port.spirit:description: CPU0 Non-mask able Interrupt.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0CURRPRI
spirit:port.spirit:description: indicates what priority interrupt, or base boost, is being used now. CURRPRI represents the pre-emption priority, and does not indicate secondary priority.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0AUXFAULT
spirit:port.spirit:description: CPU0 auxiliary fault status information from the system.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0FIXMASTERTYPE
spirit:port.spirit:description: Configure fix HMASTER value for AHB transactions on AHB-AP interface if set (tie HIGH).

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0ISOLATEn
spirit:port.spirit:description: Isolate core power domain.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0RETAINn
spirit:port.spirit:description: Retain core state during power-down. Connected by power annotation within CPU.

spirit:port.spirit:name: JTAGNSW
spirit:port.spirit:description: JTAG or Serial-Wire selection JTAG mode(1) or SW mode(0).

spirit:port.spirit:name: SWV
spirit:port.spirit:description: Single-Wire Viewer Data.

spirit:port.spirit:name: TRCENA
spirit:port.spirit:description: Trace enable.

spirit:port.spirit:name: CPU0GATEHCLK
spirit:port.spirit:description: when high, HCLK can be turned off.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: WIC_LINES
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Number of interrupt lines for Wake Interrupt Controller.

spirit:fileSet.spirit:name: RTL
spirit:fileSet.spirit:description: This is the RTL source for IoT subsystem of Cortex-M3 DesignStart Eval
